```{r global_options, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
#create and save functions
not_all_na <- function(x) any(!is.na(x))

CN <-function(GRP){
#SCS TR-55 Table 2-2b â€“ Runoff curve numbers for cultivated agricultural lands: Row crops:Straight row (SR):Good
    if (GRP == 'A'){
    CN = 67
  } else if (GRP == 'B'){
    CN = 78
  } else if (GRP == 'C'){
    CN = 85
  } else if (GRP == 'D'){
    CN = 89
  }
  return(CN)
}
```

```{r}
#Base soil table from soilGrids
soilgrids_sol <- read_sol('E:/PhD_research/Chapter2/inputs/SoilGrids-for-DSSAT/US.SOL', id_soil = 'US02835148')
DSSAT_vars <- names(soilgrids_sol)
DSSAT_SSURGO_vars <-data.frame(vars = DSSAT_vars,vals_ssurgo = as.character(SSURGO_vars))
new_soil<- soilgrids_sol
for (vv in DSSAT_vars){
  index <- which(DSSAT_SSURGO_vars$vars==vv)
  new_soil[[vv]] <- list(SSURGO_vars[[index]])
  new_soil[[vv]] <- ifelse(is.na(new_soil[[vv]]), soilgrids_sol[[vv]],new_soil[[vv]])
  nly<-length(new_soil[[vv]][[1]])
  if (nly>1){
    new_soil[[vv]][[1]] <- ifelse(is.na(new_soil[[vv]][[1]]), soilgrids_sol[[vv]][[1]],new_soil[[vv]][[1]])
  }
}

write_sol(new_soil,title='ExpKinston2021_SoilGrids+SSURGO','NC.SOL')
```
